website_summaries.verdict: Family favorite for instant itch relief.
pros: Provides relief not just from mosquito bites, but also poison ivy, oak, and sumac rashes
Four different varieties including a pen, gel, cream, and an all-natural option
Itch relief usually lasts a few hours, especially if applied right after getting bitten by a bug
cons: Some are disappointed that ammonia is an inactive ingredient

customer_reviews.title: I have used After Bite for years, but this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used After Bite for years, but this is the first one I bought since they changed the amount of ammonia they put in it. This product is now as worthless as all the other anti-itch insect bite items I've tried. I used to brag about this product, but no more. They need to go back to the heavy-duty ammonia formula. That took the itch away immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Dokie KO

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The original formula was perfect. This is a total waste of time, effort and money. Does not stop the itch as the original formula did. Does nothing that I could tell. Too bad. They had a good thing and they decided to cheapen it up and ruin it. Cannot think of any other reason they would change the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Mcclung

customer_reviews.title: Not has good as the first product
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this at a gift shop in Alaska and it worked great. I re ordered through Amazon and found that it did not have ammonia as an ingredient. It had baking soda, which was as good as nothing got the bug bites I get. I thought the baking soda was for children. Very appointed
customer_reviews.author: M. Beals

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: This doesn't have ammonia.
customer_reviews.text: There are two kinds of After Bite. This one has Baking Soda and a lot less effective. The ORIGINAL has ammonia and works better.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny's Gems

customer_reviews.title: Not original working formula
customer_reviews.text: Not original formula. If the original ingredient is in this its weak does not work for me at all. Am desperate to find original. New and improved always means made cheaper and not the same. Did not read reviews,why change what works. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jewellery addict

customer_reviews.title: BAKING SODA-Read the description
customer_reviews.text: READ THE DESCRIPTION. My fault for not doing so. It is not like my old After Bite which is ammonia. This is baking soda, although ammonia is also listed as an inactive ingredient. If I wanted to use baking soda, I would have made a paste just like my mother used to do for me eons ago. This product is pretty useless. What happened to the old After Bite? I am going to Google ammonia and see if I can make my own concoction.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4-pack is a good bargain
customer_reviews.text: The price of this is very good; I usually pay at least $5 for ONE. I keep one of these in my purse at all times, especially in the summer, and I cannot tell you how many times I have used it for myself or others. It is a great product and it works! I was at an outside fair a few years ago and a 3 year old got stung by a bee so I ran over with my After Bite and gave it to the mother who couldn't thank me enough. Great to have with you everywhere; parks, beach, any outdoor (or indoor) event, jogging, cycling, just everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ms McGee

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take along on a trip to Thailand where I knew that no matter what repellant I used, I was bound to get a few bites. It worked ok but learned on this trip from one of our guides that the best thing to counteract the itching and swelling from mosquito bites is Tiger Balm - get that instead!
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: After Bite Insect Bite Treatment 0.5-ounce (4 Pack)
customer_reviews.text: After Bite is a great product to have around the house and in my first Aid Kit, I have used it for man years. It does have a ammonia scent but it works fast at dulling the sting or bite and helps bring the swelling down. This product was a 4 pack special and is a great value for the money, I'm glad Amazon.com makes this product available, sometimes a have a hard time finding this particular roll on tube in the supermarket, I'm very happy with my purchase and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: I was so glad to find the bite sticks on Amazon as they ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the last package of After Bite in my town, and it turned out to be a cream and not the stick that I was expecting. I was so glad to find the bite sticks on Amazon as they work fantastic at calming the itch and inflammation of insect bites from mosquitoes and tsetse fly bites that I got on safari to Mozambique. I was so glad to find more of the After Bite sticks. They are the best treatment to calm horrible itching and inflammation that can bother you all day and keep you awake at night. Dab this on and feel better quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaGranny

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: My wife is an absolute mosquito magnet. She sprays herself every hour with heavy duty repellent. The mosquitoes don’t seem to like me and don’t bite me very much. My wife swears by After Bite and reports that other products just do not work well. Based on her recommendation I’d say that After Bite is necessary to survive in the Northwoods of Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: ted dastych

customer_reviews.title: Cannot survive summer months without this!
customer_reviews.text: After Bite has changed my life! Mosquitoes LOVE me. They feast on me like it’s Thanksgiving and I have bad reactions to bites where they swell up in these huge ugly blisters and the itching lasts for a whole week! Because of After Bite, I’m not as afraid to go outside in the evenings. I buy these things in a ready supply and keep one everywhere, including my purse. I apply as soon as I feel that I’ve been bitten and reapply every time I feel itchy. Within a few hours, the bites no longer itch! Thank God for this stuff!!! 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: dragonmermaid

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, and you'll have enough to keep in your tackle box, on the deck, and in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: After Bite is getting harder to find in retail stores in my area. I'm glad I located it online, because there really is no better way to take the sting out of a bite than with the satisfying counter-sting of this ammonia-based product. I find that diphenhydramine- (Benadryl-) based products take too long to stop an itch, and really do prefer this over all other sting first aid options.
customer_reviews.author: Duxall Inarow

customer_reviews.title: Worthless, save your money
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed with this product. My daughter tried it and felt the same way. Very ineffective. Would not buy again. Was planning on putting it in a hunting medical kit but not after trying it several times against mosquito bites. IMO liquid bandage may work bu sealing off the bite. One thing for sure this product doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ralph Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who are mosquito magnets
customer_reviews.text: I’m one of those people who is a mosquito magnet and I swear by these things. I keep one in the medicine cabinet, but also one on my nightstand, one in my purse, one in the glove compartment of my car...you get the idea. Anywhere someone says they have a mosquito bite, I AM THERE. It’s clear and doesn’t make a mess. They work immediately and one stick will last you over a year.
customer_reviews.author: D. & N. Brady

customer_reviews.title: New formula is a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this product that really helped with my bug bites. This is a new formula and is a waste of money. It burns and does not relieve the itching at all! I would like a refund, but I’m not sure that is available. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom

customer_reviews.title: Cat pee for insect bites
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of cat pee? Wondering if it helps alleviate the sting of bug bites? Look no further because this is your jam! And no. It doesn't work. So you just end up smelling like cat pee.
customer_reviews.author: Arrowina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for ANY type of bite/sting
customer_reviews.text: After Bite is the best. We live in a rural area and spend a lot of time outdoors. After Bite is the only thing we found that takes care of a simple mosquito bite, to a fire ant bite, and everything in between. Fire ants are a huge problem where we are and when you get bit/stung by one of them the misery lasts over a week. With After Bite, it makes it tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Teri PDTop Contributor: Jewelry Making

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I had bug bites on my ankles and one on my toe. This product literally DID NOTHING!!! The itch remained. Actually got itchier as I'd apply it. It was as liquidy as water and smelled like strong hair dye. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Kesh

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: This works better than I expected. I am a mosquito magnet and have a big histamine response response to bites. This helps neutralize the itch. It would be great if I could use it right after a bite and before I scratch, but that never happens. It does sting if you out it on after scratching and breaking the skin, but it's minor. My kids love it too. It doesn't take away the itch completely but works better than cortisone cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes them skeeter bites not so bad
customer_reviews.text: I am "skeeter bait" it seems like. They LOVE me and I am reacting more badly when I get bitten with huge whelps and itching so bad I can barely stand it. This stuff takes the itch right out and seems to help with the swelling too. It's cheaper than some I've used and works better than Benadryl for bug bites. Happy.....
customer_reviews.author: NC Lady

customer_reviews.title: It does the job for the most part
customer_reviews.text: So I have never used a mosquito bite anything before, because I have never lived somewhere where if I even step outside of my house for 1 minute I get bit all over. I want to say this after bite works on most of my bites. Sometimes it has no odor, sometimes it smells like hair dye. Honestly as long as it does the job, I’d buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Naira

customer_reviews.title: I'm Itching while writing this review
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. comes as a liquid and is really runny. Smells awful, which I wasn't expecting bc the gel version fo this is fine. and oh yeah... still itching like crazy
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: The only effective anti-itch topical treatment I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for mosquito bites and for any other itchy areas that may develop after I have been working in my yard. It works within a few seconds after application and immediately reduces even intense itching. Have tried Benadryl and other topical "sticks" designed for this purpose and found After Bite far superior for both speed of action and effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Annapolis

customer_reviews.title: No more itchy bug bites!
customer_reviews.text: After Bite works great. I react to insect bites like mosquitos very badly. Big time bump that itches like crazy. If I apply this especially right away, the bump and itch are gone! Sometimes I apply 2 to 3 times for maximum effect. I've tried other brands, but for me this works the best hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Buzzy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!I
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and mosquito bites are an everyday occurrence. A quick dab of this directly on the bite and it stops itching within about a minute or two. I like them because they're small and you can take them with you in the car, in your handbag, or even in your pocket. This is a really good deal too!
customer_reviews.author: Tropical BreezeTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Takes the sting away from bug bites
customer_reviews.text: Baking soda is the active ingredient, but I think I detect the scent of ammonia or something similar. It works for me to stop itching or stinging. The manufacturer warns not to use this product on wounds or burns. All you do is roll over the bug bite with the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great for mosquito bites
customer_reviews.text: Good product for immediate relief of mosquito bite itch. Only works if you apply it immediately after the sting. Not as effective on bee stings or hornet stings. Would give 5 stars but seller messed up my order
customer_reviews.author: Len R.

customer_reviews.title: Now I have one for all my travel needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 4 pack so I could have one here at home, one at the office, one in my dop kit and one at the vacation house in the UP of Michigan. This stuff works. I use it every night before I go to bed to relieve that annoying itch that would otherwise keep my awake.
customer_reviews.author: dcwuellner

customer_reviews.title: Package has ONLY ONE tube. WRONG INFORMATION!
customer_reviews.text: According to the description, package includes four (4) .5-ounce tubes. But I found only one .5-ounce tube.
customer_reviews.author: SU MI WOO

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years. It has either been SOLD OUT or NOT CARRIED by EVERY store I have checked in my entire county. Didn't want to settle for anything else so found it on Amazon and bought a pack of four (4). This works even better than Benedryl (which I threw out as soon as I got my order of After Bite).
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Candy

customer_reviews.title: A great product that works fast
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. I am they one person that gets attacked by everything during the summer. My friend recommended this product and after purchasing and trying it for myself, i can say that it works immediately. The itchiness goes away within minutes and the bite becomes a normal or minimal size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda18

customer_reviews.title: Great itch relief product
customer_reviews.text: Wow...the After Bite medication works great! Not only does it work on easing the pain and itch from insect bites/stings but it is GREAT in reducing/eliminating many types of itchy skin. Extremely low price and good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Smells just like ammonia (cat pee) It drips the chemical pretty easily; its not very precise or adequate for small amounts. Definitely don't recommend. You do get 4 of them but i see WHY. Get yourself some different body oils. That would work so much better; peppermint, eucalyptus, tea tree, lemon--- that works sooo much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Failure to Provide Relief from Bites
customer_reviews.text: This is not as effective as the sticks I purchased. The sticks remove the itchiness after being bitten. This really doesn’t work on the itch, which is problematic, since I continue to scratch the affected area. Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Carens

customer_reviews.title: Works as it always has
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Ammonia is the key ingredient--these little applicator pens make it easy to treat stings and bites. I see others say that the formula has changed, but I don't agree. It's the same as it's been for decades.
customer_reviews.author: MoniQ

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff! I originally bought it at walmart since my daughter gets bit by literally everything on the planet. I actually had gotten bit too and it was huge. I put this stuff on and it went down within a day. I bought it on amazon because the price and got a few packs at a time. After trying so many different bug bite stuff, finally found the right one. Stops the itching pretty instantly and easy to apply without getting it on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Barocio

customer_reviews.title: Works for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Primarily use this for the mosquito season or whenever working in the garden and I get bit by those pesky bugs. It seems to do the job, as the itch stops. Like others have said, I was only sent 1 instead of the advertised amount but Amazon quickly corrected the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed. The old foil wrapped packages had a strong smell of ammonia when you opened them. These, not so much and they sure didn’t stop the sting.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming karen

customer_reviews.title: We are long time users of After Bite. Our ...
customer_reviews.text: We are long time users of After Bite. Our beach house is in the South Carolina low country and mosquitoes and no-see-ums are a fact of life. One or two drops of After Bite, and the itch is gone. The applicator makes it simple to use and we never leave home without one or two tucked into the console of the car, the backpack, etc. It's hard to believe that something so simple can work so well.... but it does.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN

customer_reviews.title: Workls -- we always keep it handy.
customer_reviews.text: We keep this in constant supply. It's not a miracle cure for a bug bite or other rashes but it does substantially reduce itching and that's worth it. It can slightly sting at application so little kids don't love it, but for anyone old enough to get past that the net result is worth it. You need to hap the tip facing down to get the liquid to come out, so that sometimes requires contortions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: placebo?
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it does anything. I've tried it on multiple mosquito and fly bites and nothing. Too bad a bought a multipack based on the reviews. I guess I should have tried one to see if it worked first.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Dependable bug bite irritation eliminator.
customer_reviews.text: Great little touch “pens” to quickly eliminate bite/sting discomfort. After the initial application hit it maybe once or twice a day for a couple of days. You’ll eventually forgot you’ve been bit. We always carry them in our travel bags. They last dormant for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: BUG BITE TONIC AT ITS BEST
customer_reviews.text: Get three of these. Carry one on your person or in your handbag, keep another in the bathroom and the third one in your automobile. Soothes the worst bug bites. Excellent against yellow fly stings.
customer_reviews.author: DUSA

customer_reviews.title: Smells like backing soda
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really do much. Smells like backing soda. Worst part is that it is a liquid that uses gravity to apply. If you are trying to apply it to the underside of your arn or leg, you will need a second person. I will stick with Eucerin itch lotion (see photo below). Works just as well and easier to apply. Best of all, it doesn't smell.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rock

customer_reviews.title: Same product but now better!
customer_reviews.text: Same product you are used to and works great on itchy bug bites but now has baking soda to help soothe even better. My mosquito repellent is to stand closer to my significant other and she really appreciates the relief this product provides since they really seem to favor her over me (I am just too bitter she explains).
customer_reviews.author: JimTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I hate mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my After Bite 'itch stick' for years, and its the only stuff that works for my bites! I'm very allergic to mosquitoes and other random bug bites, and the second i put this on, it instantly helps with swelling and itching. I will say...the smell is strong @ first, BUT its tottaly worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates itch after application
customer_reviews.text: This anti-itch tube is excellent. Each time I have applied it immediately stops the itch for quite sometime. Always apply before going to bed to eliminate the nighttime itch. Absolutely luv it
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Can't like without it
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3. I have one in my bag, the others in the house and in the beach bag. I get attacked by mosquitos all the time and nothing works to stop the itching like this Insect Bite pen.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find this in the store and purchased on Amazon. The 4 pack was much cheaper than buying individually. this should last me years. helps stop itch from insect bites.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work as well as I had hoped, took a lot of applications to even start working, doesn’t seem to be hat effective! Maybe I just have too high of expectations or maybe my skin doesn’t react to this type of product but for me it didn’t really work and I ended up not even trying anymore
customer_reviews.author: david r

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Live Without After Bite!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mosquito magnet ..... and a sand flee magnet on beach vacations. No matter how many times I spray myself with bug repellent, they find and bite me. So I pack a couple of these when traveling and always keep one in my purse. After Bite saves me from scratching myself sore! Can’t live without this!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: The smell is sooooo bad
customer_reviews.text: Although the smell disappeared in a few seconds....my cats run away after using it... I think some how it stay on the skin even human can not smell.... And still feel itchy....
customer_reviews.author: nikomini

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be less effective than the old after bite
customer_reviews.text: Remember this as a very effective anti ich medicine the last time I use it. So when I see the package and the price is good I bought it again. Bit it seems to be less effective compare to the gel I got before. So I don't know maybe the change the formula? Disappointed 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Traciee

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough. Not magic
customer_reviews.text: I like this product enough. It works best when used as soon as possible after a bite. Better than Tea Tree Oil which stinks. This cools the bite on contact without a strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: This is not very effective for bug bites
customer_reviews.text: IMHO, this product doesn't work that well on bug bites. I bought them based on a review in a Family Handyman magazine article, but I didn't think it worked very well
customer_reviews.author: B. S. Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Carry in your car to make the outdoors more enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: If big bites cause you to itch, this stuff does a great job. It numbs out the annoyance quickly. Quick spot treatment and then it’s over. We keep one stick in all our cars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mopar Madness

customer_reviews.title: Stop Scratching Mosquito Bites!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works really well for those dang mosquito bites. Sometimes takes a couple of applications for the really bad bites to get them to stop itching, but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Lucky to have for this summer
customer_reviews.text: It is particularly bad this summer for no reason... Glad to have this with the family. It does work. Of course not instantaneously getting rid of the sting, but does help alleviating the itches.
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this little product at the store. It actually does what you would want and expect it to do: stop your bite or sting from itching. It works until/unless you clean or sweat it off of the area, so dont be surprised if you need to reapply it. But that isnt really a bad thing - I mean, you would want to be able to clean it off, right? It works great, get it so those mosquito or whatever bites wont bother you with all of their itching. I recommend this to everyone and I git these fr my camping trip next month.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: not sure about the review questions. But it is a very good product. Works as described. Very easy to use. Will always keep some at hand while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Walter106

customer_reviews.title: When those bites are so irritating...
customer_reviews.text: We have found that for no see-ums on the beach or for mosquito bites that tend to linger, this product is easy to carry and can quickly stop itching.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D

customer_reviews.title: It's Ammonia
customer_reviews.text: Ammonia, that's what it is. Does nothing to stop my itching. Strong amonnia smell, Nasty! Not sure if it's safe to put on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: SapphireandIron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, get it just in case!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years, and although now I am much more careful in preventing mosquito bites (because so many people are getting so many weird diseases and according to a Bill Gates study, after human beings, mosquitoes are the #2 most responsible for peoples deaths in the world), I still want to have it handy. I have one in my office, one in the car, and others around the house. Amazon has the BEST deal around, you get this and receive 4 units, so no brainer, get it just in case ... although again, the best with mosquitoes nowadays would be prevention. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Best mosquito bite remedy on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Best mosquito bite remedy on the market. Been using it for 40 years. Keep one in all my vehicles and at home. Just need to treat the bite as soon as possible after getting bit.
customer_reviews.author: GCB

customer_reviews.title: Itch Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product and again in I am impressed. A couple of rubs with this and that itch is gone
customer_reviews.author: L. Sauder

customer_reviews.title: 100% effective
customer_reviews.text: The most effective product I have ever used for mosquitoes bites. Relief is immediate and for ever lasting. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived as advertised and sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what I wanted and needed. Local stores were all out of stock as well as going to Walmart 40 minutes away. It came sooner than expected which meant that I was a happy camper -literally.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Brower

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff takes away the sting & itch better than anything else I have tried -- except the original formula, which was basically ammonia in a roll-on stick. The new ingredients list says that they now use baking soda as the base that neutralizes the acid in the insect bites. Ammonia works even better.
customer_reviews.author: Pagurus

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: It works, really! I've never been anywhere in the world where mosquitoes aren't around to annoy, so I wouldn't go anywhere without this. If you get bitten, and it starts to itch, use this and within seconds the itch is gone and forgotten forever. Just use it before you start scratching, because if you do and break the skin, this will sting. We love this product. In a world where everyone promises you the sun and moon, this is one product that does exactly what it's supposed to do, and I am very grateful we discovered it. Five stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Prince

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: As a Boy Scout leader this is a mandatory part of a First-Aid trip. Works quickly and provides relief almost immediately. It is staple in my house as well!.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Seconds of Pain is Worth Getting Rid of the Itch
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a year-long trip that took me around the jungles and beaches of Papua New Guinea, and this product was part of my pack. This stuff isn't as strong as it used to be years back when I was a kid, but it still stings like a bee. I had plenty of bug bites over the last year, and AfterBite reliably got rid of the itchiness. Protip, give the bug bite a good scratching before applying this stuff. It seems to work best when there is a slight break in the skin for the substance to get into the bite and do its magic.
customer_reviews.author: mathewgogo

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few products I've tried that really works on stopping the itching of bites quickly. Very easy to apply. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rosieannie0

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: THE BITE MARK GOT DARKER AFTER USING IT. I THOGHT IT'S LIKE GLUE, BUT IT'S LIQUID INSIDE, ONCE YOU DIDN'T CLOSE IT TIGHTLY, IT GOSE EVERYWHERE...
customer_reviews.author: MIAO

customer_reviews.title: Works to stop the itch
customer_reviews.text: They say the active ingredient is just baking soda. But it smells like ammonia. Regardless, it really works to stop the itch and it is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: It’s really work.
customer_reviews.text: In summer. Mosquito medicine is especially needed. This medicine is very easy to use. After being bitten, it won't be so itchy to apply. It can also reduce swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Bella.🌸

customer_reviews.title: After Bite is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I always get bit everywhere we go and this is by far the best product to relieve bug itches. I have used the roll on liquid and the cream, both are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good Bite Formula
customer_reviews.text: It burned a little on contact with bite but eased pain and overnight the swelling had gone down dramatically. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Scam product
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t help release itch at all and It smells bad. Amazon won’t allow return for this item. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Quan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as stated. About the only thing that works for me when I get mosquito bites, which is often in Florida!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Kaz

customer_reviews.title: it burns, not good for kids
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my daughter, but they did not mention that it burns a lot, not recommended for kids, only for adult
customer_reviews.author: Rehana S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for noseam/tiny fly bites! It does sting a little bit when you first put it on..... but worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this brand for many many years now. There is no "warmth" so I did not rate that.
customer_reviews.author: John & Manuela

customer_reviews.title: Best when used within the first hour
customer_reviews.text: Most effective when applied REPEATEDLY during the 1st hour after the bite. I dab on lots and usually the bite is gone by the next day. The package says to use as often as needed, but I probably exceed the manufacturers expectation. But it works. Really amazing. If you don't get the bite treated with this product during the first hour (sometimes I don't notice a bite till the next day), Afterbite Plus, a gel, works better. Both are better for mosquito bites than hydrocortisone cream.
customer_reviews.author: ALD

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this exclusively for several years. It works better for me than another other product.
customer_reviews.author: ellie95

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best After Bite product. Mosquitoes, ivy, no-see-ums, fleas . . . This is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: David E.

customer_reviews.title: Not the solution I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Living near Florida's Gulf Coast provided lots of opportunity to test this product! I sure was looking forward to erasing the itch, but, unfortunately, After Bite did not deliver much relief for me. Possibly, I didn't apply quickly enough... It may be more beneficial in the long run to prevent mosquito bites (as much as possible.) I found a recipe online for a natural bug repellent that has worked well for us and our neighbors. It consists of lemon juice, vanilla and lavender essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L. Lahaye

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I've used it for mosquito bites, chigger bites, and even bee stings! You'll want to apply it as soon as you know you've been bit and then apply as needed as the itch returns. It can sting a bit if you've scratched the top layer of your skin off, but the stinging tends to be quite soothing when it is replacing an annoying, unending itch! Plus, this is a great alternative to cortisone creams (which will eventually thin your skin and is not good for you).
customer_reviews.author: A. Robles

customer_reviews.title: I really like that I can keep this in my purse so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great portability. I really like that I can keep this in my purse (or tucked in my sports bra when I'm walking our dog) so that I'm ready for whenever I get bitten. Which is a lot unfortunately! The mosquitos really love me. It does help keep the itching in check for a decent time. I'm not saying you'll never reapply but I think it's better than anything I've tried so far. I should also mention that it is liquid so even though the dispenser only has a tiny hole for it to come out of it is still likely to drip once you apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Goochorama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a package deal and it doesn't work longer that a couple minutes of relief. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adeshaw

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. You do have to reapply somewhat often. It does have an ammonia smell but that is one of the ingredients that makes it work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay Bug Reliever for Relief Outside the House.
customer_reviews.text: I give the Tender after bite itch eraser a 3 out of 5 Pros:- Temporarily relieves itching - Comes in a very portable container (Size of a large Sharpie) - Affordable Cons:- Itch comes back after about 30 minutes - Not very much liquid in each tube. Conclusion: Using Ice is a better option, but this is a good bug itch reliever if you're on the go and are willing to store it in your purse or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: We could NOT live with out this!! It works best if applied quickly after a bit, like w/in 30 minutes. The bites nearly disappear by the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Grade A Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really even against Yellow Jackets.
customer_reviews.text: My brother was bitten by a yellow jacket this morning After Bite relieved the pain in less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: takes some of the sting and itch away from mosquito bites. works with bee stings also.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a couple of hours, then you need to reapply. Smells terrible as it has ammonia.
customer_reviews.author: Melrock

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Thus is the Only product I use for insect bites the only effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: It works, but does not seem to work as quickly or as well as the original
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to work as quickly or as well as the original that had ammonia, but I don't think it had baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: SKRL

customer_reviews.title: Real instant relief
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand for at least 20 years as I get huge, itchy welt at site of any bug bite.
customer_reviews.author: Kabob

customer_reviews.title: Really does stop the itch
customer_reviews.text: This is strong stuff! It has an incredible strong smell. But it really does stop the itching. When you open it it does leak though. It’s just a hole it pours out of. Would be better if it was in a little spray bottle because it will get on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

product_meta.title: After Bite, Pharmacist Preferred Insect Bite Treatment, 0.5-Ounce (4 Pack), Multi (0006-1030)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 4After Bite's advanced formula with baking soda now provides even better relief for the whole family. For over 40 years, After Bite's pharmacist-preferred formula has provided instant itch relief for bites from mosquitoes, fleas, ticks and other common insects - so there's no more scratching. The proprietary mix of soothing ingredients acts fast when you need it most. Be prepared with After Bite and don't let insect bites ruin your outdoor family fun.
feature_bullets: After Bite - a family favorite for 40 years, is a proprietary formula that relieves the itch and sting from mosquito, flea, and other insect bites.
For instant and permanent relief from itching and pain, we now added Baking Soda, grandma's home remedy against insect bites and stings.
Pharmacist-preferred, it's endorsed by experts, so you know it works.
Simple to apply, the applicator tip makes local, no-mess application a breeze.
Package includes four (4) .5-ounce applicator tubes that offer the perfect portable relief to keep in your pack, pocket, purse, and a drawer at home

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
